---
title: "code-assurance-playbook"
---

This website documents the tools and process that NHS Business Services
Authority (NHSBSA) analytical teams use to create analytical code and how to
assure it.

It is intended to complement, not replace, existing UK government and NHS
guidance:

* Analysis Function Duck book
* NHSE England RAP Community of Practice
* NHS Health RAP playbook
* Department of Health and Social Care (DHSC)
